title: Selected Topics in Biology; Diseases Due to Dysfunctional Cell Organelles
description:
Prerequisites: BSCI330 or BCHM461 or BCHM463.

A seminar-style course aimed at giving students opportunities to research, prepare, and present advanced-level lectures on genetically linked disorders of cell organelles.

(Sponsoring Dept: BIOL). Acceptable towards Biological Sciences Specialization Areas: CEBG (Cell Biology category), GENB (Cell Biology & Physiology category), and PHNB.
